casebody.data:
Sophia Frank, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Barbara Fahrbach, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Charles Ludovici, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Isaac Lubin, Respondent v The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1892. Appeals by defendants from judgments respectively entered upon the reports of a referee. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for, respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Dugro, J.; Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Gildersleeve, J., concurred.

Judgments affirmed, with costs, upon authority of Jordan v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Co., ante page 385.
